name: Gideon
description: Judge who defeated the Midianite army with just 300 men using torches and jars. Refused kingship, declaring God alone should rule.

three-hundred.name: The Three Hundred
three-hundred.prompt: standing before his 300 chosen warriors at night - torches and empty jars ready, small band against massive army, unconventional warfare about to begin

torch-and-horn.name: Torch and Horn
torch-and-horn.prompt: holding torch high in one hand, horn in other - mouth open shouting 'Sword of the Lord and Gideon!', jar shattered at feet, the moment of chaos unleashed

threshing-wheat.name: Called from the Winepress
threshing-wheat.prompt: threshing wheat in winepress hiding from Midianites - looking up startled as angel calls him 'mighty warrior', the unlikely hero's beginning

refusing-crown.name: Refusing the Crown
refusing-crown.prompt: pushing away offered crown with raised palm - people offering kingship, Gideon refusing, pointing upward to true King

testing-fleece.name: The Fleece Test
testing-fleece.prompt: kneeling before wet fleece on dry ground - seeking confirmation, the doubter who needed signs, honest uncertainty

surprise-attack.name: Midnight Chaos
surprise-attack.prompt: in midst of midnight chaos - broken jars, blazing torches, enemy camp in confusion, Gideon directing his men, psychological warfare perfected
